Summary: Similar to flares from jet but slower
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ballinger
There was one other sighting in Ballinger on or around September 14th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo days ago there were some very bright lights on the groung a few blocks away and a girl shot a video of some lights in the sky here in Ballinger, TX. I am writing to see if you could take a quick look at this and give your opinion on it. It looks like flares from a jet or helicopter but they are alot slower than the ones i've seen. Thank You.
